The HBVr risk for chronically infected HBV patients on ABA treatment has been explored only in small retrospective studies. In a study by Kim and colleagues,
77 four of eight HBsAg positive patients who did not received prophylaxis developed HBVr after a mean period of 10.5â€‰months. An Italian retrospective multicenter study collected data on 72 RA patients treated with ABA who had either chronic or resolved HBV infection.
78 All of the chronically infected patients received antiviral prophylaxis. No HBVr cases were identified in either group.
